name: Seerr
description: Seerr is a free and open source media request and discovery manager for Jellyfin, Plex, and Emby. It integrates with your existing services like Sonarr and Radarr, features a customizable request system, granular permissions, notification agents, watchlisting & blacklisting, and a mobile-friendly design. This is the unified successor to Overseerr and Jellyseerr.
author: seerr-team
